autoDepositIdleFunds().details: Automatically deposit idle funds to ERC-4626 vault Called after rent deposit or expense payment

calculateIdleFunds().details: Calculate idle funds available for deposit Idle = total balance - expenses - reserve threshold

depositToVault(uint256).details: Manually deposit funds to vault (owner only)

emergencyWithdraw().details: Emergency withdraw all funds from vault (owner only)

getCurrentPeriod().details: Get current period from rent vault

getTotalAssetsInVault().details: Get total assets in vault (principal + yield)

getYieldEarned().details: Get current yield earned (assets in vault - principal deposited)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCashFlowEngine(address).details: Set the cash flow engine address

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawForDistribution(uint256).details: Withdraw funds from vault for distribution

params.amount: Amount of USDC to withdraw (minimum expected) Includes slippage protection - reverts if less than requested amount is received
